title: Sanguine Blade
content:
Sanguine Blade Uncommon 2~9 Damage 1d8+1Piercing Scarlet Remittance: Gain a +1 bonus to Attack Rolls, damage, and Spell Save DC for every foe you slay, up to a maximum of +3. Weapon Enchantment +1 Scarlet Regeneration Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: Blood enthralls and holds great dominion over people. Its wine-dark stain anoints even the pacifist in such troubled times as these. Rapier Finesse 0.9 130
